milestones.title: Chandrayaan Programme
milestones.description: Chandrayaan-1 confirmed lunar water molecules. Chandrayaan-2 orbiter continues polar science. Chandrayaan-3 achieved a south-pole landing with Vikram + Pragyan in 2023.

milestones.title: Mangalyaan (Mars Orbiter Mission)
milestones.description: Launched in 2013 via PSLV, became the first Asian Mars mission to reach orbit on its maiden attempt, showcasing frugal engineering.

milestones.title: Indian Space Highlights
milestones.description: From Aryabhata (1975) to Aditya-L1 (2023), ISRO steadily strengthened indigenous launchers, spacecraft platforms, and deep-space communications.
